pullrequest.title: Added camera intrinsics (fx, fy, cx, cy, s).

content.raw: Hi, thanks for the addition. However, I don’t see it on [http://sdformat.org/spec?ver=1.6&elem=sensor#sensor\_camera](http://sdformat.org/spec?ver=1.6&elem=sensor#sensor_camera) . Is it possible to rebuild the web to include this tag? I always thought this web is the canonical reference…
content.html: Hi, thanks for the addition. However, I don’t see it on http://sdformat.org/spec?ver=1.6&elem=sensor#sensor_camera . Is it possible to rebuild the web to include this tag? I always thought this web is the canonical reference…
